Section.Catchline: Notification to Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services of changes of partner or officer or employees.

Subsection.Text: After filing the application, unless the department declines to issue the license or revokes it after issuance, an agency or school shall, within 5 working days of the withdrawal, removal, replacement, or addition of any or all partners or officers, notify and file with the department complete applications for such individuals. The agency’s or school’s good standing under this chapter shall be contingent upon the department’s approval of any new partner or officer.

Each agency or school shall, upon the employment or termination of employment of a licensee, report such employment or termination immediately to the department and, in the case of a termination, report the reason or reasons therefor. The report shall be on a form prescribed by the department.
